meta.description: Determine the optimal number of top-loading and front-loading washing machines to buy to minimize the total number of machines while meeting washing and energy requirements.

sets.name: MACHINES
sets.description: Types of washing machines available for purchase.

params.name: washing_capacity
params.description: Number of items each type of machine can wash per day.

params.name: energy_consumption
params.description: Energy consumption in kWh per day for each type of machine.

vars.name: num_machines
vars.description: Number of each type of washing machine to purchase.

objective.name: min_total_machines
objective.description: Minimize the total number of washing machines purchased.

constraints.name: washing_capacity_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure the laundromat can wash at least 5000 items per day.

constraints.name: energy_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure the laundromat does not exceed 7000 kWh per day.

constraints.name: top_loading_limit
constraints.description: At most 40% of the machines can be top-loading.

constraints.name: min_front_loading_machines
constraints.description: At least 10 machines should be front-loading.
